mon.title: **:exclamation::exclamation:   W A R N I N G   :exclamation::exclamation:**
mon.description:
I really hate mondays. But even on days like these, I really enjoy drinking some water at this hour. :potable_water:

You'd better do it as well!

thu.title: **:exclamation::exclamation:   A V V E R T E N Z A   :exclamation::exclamation:**
thu.description: È giunto l'attimo d'abbeverarsi d'acqva, poichè l'istante de l'idratazione è benuto! :potable_water:

wedtue.title: **:exclamation::exclamation:   W A R N I N G   :exclamation::exclamation:**
wedtue.description:
It's real water hours. :potable_water:

Take a glass of water as fast as possible!

fri.title: **:exclamation::exclamation:   W A R N I N G   :exclamation::exclamation:**
fri.description:
Why, yes, it's real water hours. :potable_water:

Humble men like me like having a sip at this hour of the day.

sat.description:
It's real water hours. :potable_water:

Take a glass of water as fast as possible!

sun.description:
uwu
I-It's real water hours. :potable_water:

Take a glass of water as fast as possible, b-baka!
